titleStmt.title: A true description of His Majesties royall ship, built this yeare 1637. at Wooll-witch in Kent To the great glory of our English nation, and not paraleld in the whole Christian world. Published by authoritie.
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Okes, for Iohn Aston, and are to bee sold at his shop in Cat-eaten streete at the signe of the Buls-head,

notesStmt.note: The ship was the "Sovereign of the Seas".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
